description: Aggregated statistics for a animal behaviour or similar observation over a time period.

startDateTime.description: The start date/time of the aggregation period for this particular statistic.

duration.description: The type of period duration (e.g. 1D, 24H, 1W). A call may return statistics with different durations.

isIncomplete.description: This flag is present with the value true, when there is insufficient or incomplete data in the duration.
